Synopsis: 
Tells the story of Lou Ford, the deputy sheriff of a small town, a handsome, charming and unpretentious. 

Lou has a lot of problems: problems with women, problems with the law. There have been a growing number of murder victims in their jurisdiction of West Texas. And the fact is that in reality is a sadist, a psychopath, a murderer. Suspicions begin to fall on Lou, and is only a matter of time before you run out of alibis. But in the wild universe, dark, dark, rather than "noir" in Thompson, nothing is ever what it seems, and researchers is that pursuing it could also have their own secrets. 

Production notes: 
Based on the novel by Jim Thompson.
